summary:
This is a compilation of 3 mods, to make the female mannequins look like a proper human female, without differently coloured heads, and an attempt to stop them from moving. Tested it with Dovahkin\'s hideout and Deus Mons.

Requires CBBE
descriptionHtml:
This is a compilation of 3 mods, to make the female mannequins look like a proper human female, without differently coloured heads, and an attempt to stop them from moving. Tested it with Dovahkin\'s hideout and Deus Mons.

Results may vary: After several initial tests and during many run througs in the hideout during my gameplay, I haven\'t seen a single mannequin move. This afternoon however, after saving and reloading inside the Hideout to reload a few ini changes, a few mannequins moved in the large room of the Hideout. However I\'ve never seen any mannequin move in Deus Mons. I haven\'t been able to replicate it after about a dozen times, so I don\'t know what caused it. Sadly I have no knowledge of coding, scripting or programming, so I can\'t make a guarenteed fix. In the end this combination of mods is still closest thing we have to a fix thus far.

At least for the good looking part, non wooden heads and non discoloured heads it\'s a guaranteed solution.

Load order for the ESP files:
female mannequins.esp
female mannequins in homes.esp
Mannequin.esp

Requires CBBE (used V3.1): http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666

Credits:
Female Mannequins by Thepal, http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9131
All Body Mods compatible Female mannequin by Koryushin, http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4164
Vanilla Mannequin Script Fix by, SLuckyD, http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10652

Disclaimer: I don\'t own any rights to the files you have downloaded, I simply combined the three into a working female mannequin package. As soon as someone releases a better fix I will remove this post.
author: DaniWes
